title: Neoprene Oven Mitt (1)
description: Shield yourself from cooking burns by diffusing heat with this durable Neoprene Oven Mitt. This kitchen essential has a thick neoprene and quilted fabric design that provides a secure protective layer and washes easily. Measures approximately 13 x 7 x 1.5.
